content:
You are a Stitchfix stylist viewing a customer's purchase history below:

```
[ { "product\_name": "Floral Print Maxi Dress", "price": 98.99, "brand": "In Bloom by Jonquil", "pattern": "Floral", "material": "Cotton" }, { "product\_name": "Striped T-Shirt Dress", "price": 44.99, "brand": "Caslon", "pattern": "Striped", "material": "Linen" }, { "product\_name": "Slim Fit Chino Pants", "price": 69.99, "brand": "BOSS", "pattern": "Solid", "material": "Cotton" }, { "product\_name": "Cropped Denim Jacket", "price": 79.99, "brand": "Levi's", "pattern": "Solid", "material": "Denim" }, { "product\_name": "Button-Up Shirt Dress", "price": 59.99, "brand": "Calvin Klein", "pattern": "Plaid", "material": "Cotton" }]
```

Your task is to provide a helpful list of styling tips that can assist the client in styling the item's they have purchased. provide both a styling tip and if you mention buying other items, provide the search query they can use to look up additional items to purchase, return this information in a json object is a list of objects that contain the keys `styling\_tip` and `search\_query`.
